name: Pilus Game
description: a game called pilus. why is it said pilus? because the character is like a pilus (Indonesian light snack) pilus is a simple game, but challenging, and make players feel challenged and sometimes the players made upset with this game. but believe me, this game is very exciting. players have to race with enemies, have to shoot the enemy right and run to a safe place. the task to be done by the player just shoot and avoid the enemy's attack. if it has reached the target at that level, the player is entitled to proceed to the next level.
